title: Certificates
text:
2024



Google Advanced Data Analytics Professional Certificate – Coursera & Google
(Completed: February 2024)
A comprehensive 7-course program covering statistics, data analysis, machine learning, and data-driven decision-making.
Courses Completed:

Foundations of Data Science

Get Started with Python

Go Beyond the Numbers: Translate Data Into Insights
The Power of Statistics

Regression Analysis: Simplify Complex Data Relationship
The Nuts and Bolts of Machine Learning
Google Advanced Data Analytics Capstone




  




2023




Introduction to Databases – Coursera & Meta
A foundational course from Meta introducing core database concepts and SQL for data querying and management.



  






Share Data Through the Art of Visualization – Coursera & Google
A hands-on course covering data visualization on Tableau. Starting from data preparation to the concept of data visualization to get the best insights.



  






Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python – Coursera & IBM
A practical course focused on using SQL to query databases, designed specifically for data science workflows with Python.



  






Python and Pandas for Data Engineering – Coursera & Duke University
A hands-on course focusing on data engineering tools using Python and Pandas. Includes project environment setup, working with data structures, and essential development tools.
